1.name: Smithing Recipe→Item
1.prompt:
Create an item definition for this smithing recipe:

{
  "recipeId": "smithing_iron_axe",
  "stationTier": 1,
  "stationType": "smithing",
  "inputs": [
    {
      "materialId": "iron_ingot",
      "quantity": 3,
      "materialName": "Iron Ingot",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "common",
      "materialNarrative": "Moderately conductive, somewhat malleable when heated. The workhorse of civilization - reliable, abundant, essential for weapons, tools, and armor.",
      "materialTags": [
        "refined",
        "metal",
        "standard"
      ]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "birch_plank",
      "quantity": 2,
      "materialName": "Birch Plank",
      "materialTier": 2,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialNarrative": "Refined birch planks, perfect for detailed craftwork.",
      "materialTags": [
        "refined",
        "wood",
        "fine"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "narrative": "Solid iron axe for serious forestry work. Bites deep and true."
}

Return ONLY the JSON item definition, no extra text.

2.name: Refining Recipe→Material
2.prompt:
Create a material definition for this refining recipe:

{
  "recipeId": "refining_steel_ore_to_ingot",
  "stationTier": 1,
  "stationType": "refining",
  "inputs": [
    {
      "materialId": "steel_ore",
      "quantity": 1,
      "materialName": "Steel Ore",
      "materialTier": 2,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialNarrative": "Harder and more durable than pure iron. The secret of its strength lies in its carbon-rich structure. A true warrior's metal.",
      "materialTags": [
        "basic",
        "metal",
        "advanced"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "narrative": "Forging steel from carbon-rich ore. Requires intense heat."
}

Return ONLY the JSON material definition, no extra text.

11.name: Prerequisites→Title

1x2.name: Smithing Placement
1x2.prompt:
Create a placement pattern for this smithing recipe on a 3x3 grid:

{
  "recipeId": "smithing_iron_axe",
  "itemId": "iron_axe",
  "tier": 1,
  "gridSize": "3x3",
  "inputs": [
    {
      "materialId": "iron_ingot",
      "quantity": 3,
      "materialName": "Iron Ingot",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "common",
      "materialNarrative": "Moderately conductive, somewhat malleable when heated. The workhorse of civilization - reliable, abundant, essential for weapons, tools, and armor.",
      "materialTags": ["refined", "metal", "standard"]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "birch_plank",
      "quantity": 2,
      "materialName": "Birch Plank",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "common",
      "materialNarrative": "Smooth, pale wood from birch trees. Light and flexible, perfect for handles and shafts.",
      "materialTags": ["refined", "wood", "flexible"]
    }
  ],
  "itemMetadata": {
    "narrative": "Solid iron axe for serious forestry work. Bites deep and true.",
    "tags": ["tool", "axe", "quality"]
  }
}

Return ONLY the JSON placement pattern with placementMap, no extra text.

2x2.name: Refining Placement
2x2.prompt:
Create a core/surrounding placement pattern for this refining recipe:

{
  "recipeId": "refining_steel_ore_to_ingot",
  "materialId": "steel_ingot",
  "tier": 2,
  "coreInput": {
    "materialId": "steel_ore",
    "quantity": 1,
    "materialName": "Steel Ore",
    "materialTier": 2,
    "materialRarity": "uncommon",
    "materialNarrative": "Harder and more durable than pure iron. The secret of its strength lies in its carbon-rich structure. A true warrior's metal.",
    "materialTags": ["basic", "metal", "advanced"]
  },
  "surroundingInputs": [],
  "materialMetadata": {
    "narrative": "Superior to iron in every way. Holds a keen edge, resists corrosion, and strikes with authority.",
    "tags": ["refined", "metal", "advanced"]
  }
}

Return ONLY the JSON placement pattern with coreInputs and surroundingInputs, no extra text.

3x2.name: Alchemy Placement
3x2.prompt:
Create a sequential ingredient placement for this alchemy recipe:

{
  "recipeId": "alchemy_greater_mana_potion",
  "itemId": "greater_mana_potion",
  "tier": 2,
  "inputs": [
    {
      "materialId": "arcane_dust",
      "quantity": 3,
      "materialName": "Arcane Dust",
      "materialTier": 2,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialNarrative": "Crystallized essence of magical energy. Glows with a soft blue light.",
      "materialTags": ["elemental", "arcane", "magical"]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "moonflower",
      "quantity": 2,
      "materialName": "Moonflower",
      "materialTier": 2,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialNarrative": "Rare flower that blooms only under moonlight. Contains potent magical properties.",
      "materialTags": ["plant", "magical", "rare"]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "crystal_shard",
      "quantity": 1,
      "materialName": "Crystal Shard",
      "materialTier": 2,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialNarrative": "Fragment of pure crystal. Amplifies magical energies.",
      "materialTags": ["crystal", "magical", "amplifier"]
    }
  ],
  "itemMetadata": {
    "narrative": "A potent mixture of arcane ingredients. Restores magical energy and enhances spellcasting.",
    "tags": ["potion", "mana", "consumable", "magical"]
  }
}

Return ONLY the JSON placement pattern with ingredients array (slot, materialId, quantity), no extra text.

5x2.name: Enchanting Placement

    {

      "quantity": 4,

      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
